backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, categories, cart management, and product variant utilities with authorization middleware.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of multiple frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining storefront and admin routes wrapped by the site layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that checks admin permissions and blocks access with an alert if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile info and submit it via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandMa: Renders the site logo and brand name.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Featured: Displays a grid of predefined product categories linking to their category pages.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Shows a product preview with name, price, description, category badge, and links to the product page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with navigation links, WhatsApp support, and branding credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with navigation, cart and wishlist icons, user access, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout combining header, footer, routed content, and the profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/product/ReviewSe: Handles review submission for authenticated users and displays a list of product reviews.
frontend/src/components/product/VariantS: UI to select product variants by color and size using badges.
frontend/src/components/support/WhatsApp: Button opening a WhatsApp chat using configured support number and message.
frontend/src/config/support.ts: Defines support configuration including WhatsApp number and default message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and identity loading. Includes helpers for creating an auth client and exposing login, clear, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Sets the page title and description meta tag on mount using React effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that call backend actor methods for categories, products, reviews, cart operations, and user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Creates a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor and returns the session URL through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the user account page with login prompts, profile data, shortcuts, and admin access when applicable.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Lists all categories in a table with ID, name, and parent category.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin dashboard metrics placeholders and a quick actions section.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with sidebar navigation and route guard wrapping nested admin pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Simple orders admin page showing a header and placeholder text.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page listing products and providing a modal form to add new ones.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Support inbox admin page displaying a header and empty state message.
User management page allowing admins to assign roles to users via a form.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StripeSetupPane: Stripe configuration panel for viewing setup status and submitting API key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart with item details, quantity updates, removal actions, and subtotal calculation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products for a given category, including loading skeletons and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles cart review, shipping info form, payment method selection, and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage hero, promo banner, and featured categories with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows user orders or prompts login if unauthenticated, currently displaying an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure message with navigation options to retry or return to cart.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays payment success confirmation with links to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details, variants, reviews, and allows authenticated users to add items to cart.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Provides a support contact form and WhatsApp option, submitting user inquiries with validation.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the wishlist or prompts login, currently displaying an empty wishlist state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state for a multi-category e-commerce site including architecture notes, image requirements, and existing implemented features. Includes metadata like schema version, project version, and known issues.
